title: MakeMyTrip | SSE2 | 4.5 years
content:
Education: Tier-3 College
Years of Experience: 4.5 Years
Prior Experience: Product based B2C company
CCTC: 21 LPA

Date of the Offer: 25-Jan-2025
Company: MakeMyTrip
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer-2(Backend Java)
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 28 LPA
Bonus: NA(No bonuses/RSU/V-pay)
**Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 29LPA (All Fixed)**
Benefits: Only medical insurance

**1. Is this a good offer from makemytrip, if not suggest how much should i ask for?
2. Is it really worth joining for this CTC?**
